text: phir yadi tum vimukh rah gaye, to mainne tumhen vah upadesh pahuncha diya hai, jisake saath mujhe bheja gaya hai aur mera paalanahaar tumhaara sthaan tumhaare siva kisee[1] aur jaati ko de dega aur tum use kuchh haani nahin pahuncha sakoge, vaastav mein, mera paalanahaar pratyek cheez ka rakshak hai
